Class DConnector

  • public final class DConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static methods giving access to game data like items, NPCs, etc; TODO rewrite item access methods

        Builds and returns weapon from line of text
        Parameters:

        gc - Slick game container
        Returns:
        New weapon
